snippet: Yahoo said Wednesday that it had named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its chief executive.
abstract: Yahoo said Wednesday that it had named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said Wednesday that it had named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its chief executive to replace Carol Bartz, who was dismissed in September. Mr. Thompson has been running PayPal, the online payments unit of eBay, since early 2008. He was previously its chief technology officer. Read Steve Lohr's article »

headline.main: Yahoo Names PayPal Executive as C.E.O.
